activities: Identifiable Information is collected when (i) users voluntarily opt-in to becoming registered users, participants in referral programs, receive electronic newsletters, use community and communication services, answer surveys, enter contests and participate in other promotional opportunities provided on the Amplifinity Site, and (ii) third parties provide such information to us or to our customers solely for purposes of inviting persons to opt-in to becoming registered users.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: name, physical address, phone, email address
privacyprograms: Amplifinity has a self-regulatory, in-house privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
recoursemech: Amplifinity's independent recourse mechanism is its commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
